level.text: 901.1 Eligible customer-generators utilizing renewable resources, cogeneration,uel cells, or microturbines may elect and shall be afforded the opportunity toarticipate in net energy metering. An eligible customer-generator’s facilityhall meet all applicable safety and performance standards established by theational Electrical Code (“NEC”), National Electrical Safety Code“NESC”), the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers“IEEE”), Underwriters Laboratories (“UL”) and any other relevanttandards specified by the Commission.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 52 DCR 1587 (February 18, 2005); asmended by 55 DCR 7302 (July 4, 2008); as amended by Final Rulemaking publishedt 57 DCR 5249, 5250 (June 18, 2010).
